attributes.action: have a review into the rising costs of the Olympic Games, and how it will affect tax payers?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With news that an extra £900 million is needed for the Olympic Park, taxpayers need to know exactly how this is going to be funded and if their local council taxes will be raised to fund such fees. Also how did the people behind the Olympic didn't forsee these costs, can't they count? The UK people need answers when money is being wasted where it can be used more wisely on good measures
